addNote.description: Label for the note button in selection toolbar.

agent.description: Label/tooltip for the AI agent button.

agentInputPlaceholder.message: Type a message, use '/' for commands

agentSending.description: Text shown when message is being sent

ai.description: Short label for the AI assistant button in selection toolbar.

allFonts.description: Label for showing all available fonts.

askAI.description: Label for the AI assistant button in selection toolbar.

askQuestion.description: Placeholder or action label in AI panel.

clearChat.description: Label for the clear chat button in Agent UI.

closeReaderMode.description: Label for button to close reader mode.

collapseToolbar.description: Label for the collapse toolbar button

comingSoon.description: Label for features that will be available in the future.

contextArticleDesc.message: Use the entire article as context

copied.description: Label shown after text has been copied.

copy.description: Label for the copy button in selection toolbar.

couldNotExtract.description: Error message when article extraction fails.

currentSize.description: Label for displaying current font size.

darkBackgrounds.description: Label for dark background color presets.

darkText.description: Label for dark text color presets.

delete.description: Label for the delete button in selection toolbar.

displaySettings.description: Title for the display settings panel.

download.description: Label for downloading article as Markdown.

emptyStateDescription.message: Select a context mode and ask any question to start the conversation.

errorMessage.message: Unable to complete the request. Please try again later.

errorOccurred.description: Text shown when an error occurs

extensionDescription.message: Provide a clean, distraction-free reading experience for any article on the web.

extractingArticle.description: Message shown when extracting article content.

eyecareBackgrounds.description: Label for eye-care background color presets.

fontHiraginoSansGB.description: Description for Hiragino Sans GB font (English).

highlight.description: Label for the highlight button in selection toolbar.

lightBackgrounds.description: Label for light background color presets.

lightText.description: Label for light text color presets.

loading.description: Message shown when content is loading.

loginButton.description: Label for the login button in the login UI.

loginMessage.description: Message explaining why login is required.
loginMessage.message: Please log in to use the AI assistant feature. Login is free and helps us prevent abuse.

loginRequired.description: Title for the login required message.

noModelsAvailable.description: Text when no models are available

note.description: Label for the note button in selection toolbar.

query.description: Label for the query button in selection toolbar.

readingTheme.description: Label for the reading theme selection.

recommendedForBoth.description: Label for fonts recommended for both languages.

recommendedForEnglish.description: Label for fonts recommended for English text.

removeHighlight.description: Label for removing a highlight in selection toolbar.

selectedText.description: Label for selected text reference block

selectHighlightColor.description: Label for the highlight color picker dialog.

selectModel.description: Label for the model selector in Agent UI.

share.description: Label for the share button in selection toolbar.

startConversation.description: Text shown when no messages exist

summarize.description: Action label in AI panel to summarize.

thinking.description: Label shown while the AI is thinking.

welcomeMessage.description: Initial welcome message shown in Agent UI.
welcomeMessage.message: I'm here to help you understand what's currently visible on your screen. As you scroll, my context updates to focus on what you're reading now.

quickSummary.description: Label for the quick summary button/feature.

generatingSummary.description: Text shown when generating a summary.

noSummaryAvailable.description: Text shown when no summary is available.
